name: I've been trapped in the depths of this glitched game for 1000 years ?!
name_original: I've been trapped in the depths of this glitched game for 1000 years ?!
description:
You've been asleep for 1000 years, the game has been glitching out. Escape the game with the most charming ghost in existence. Complete puzzles and glitch your way trough the world, while uncovering the story of a glitched game.

Controls:

  • Arrows/ZQSD/WASD: Move
  • SPACE: Jump
  • LEFT CLICK: Interact with an object
  • SHIFT: Sprint

This game was made for the Buddy Up Jam: Spring 2022 in 2 weeks. 

Made by team 8 (Discord Usernames):

  • Glyph : https://agamingpenguin.itch.io/ (Code)
  • Dylan Chambore: https://dylanchambore.itch.io (Design)
  • Moogle (Art)
  • Rares The Noob: https://rares-the-noob.itch.io/ (Code)
  • Johannes (Art)
  • Lady Nona (Art)
  • SpaghettDoggo (Music)
  • Adam (Design)
  • K9 (Art)

This was a team effort, so roles may be mixed.
